body:
Hi Djordje, Thanks for response. Place is [Riga, Latvia
](https://www.google.lv/maps/place/R%C4%ABga/@57.6254857,25.9608511,5.75z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x46eecfb0e5073ded:0x400cfcd68f2fe30) So it is not so close to equator. Probably the missing, but generated Direct Normal Radiation and Diffuse Horizontal Radiation does this.. 

And I also tried to increase precision with same results. 
Then I made simple test with galapagos as AC energy for fitness and still get 0º as best angle..
